400.description: Invalid refund type or already confirmed

post.summary: Confirm receipt of federal or state refund

400.description: Invalid type or commission already paid

post.summary: Mark federal or state commission as paid

200.description: List of clients with unpaid commissions

get.summary: Get clients who confirmed refunds but have not paid commission

delete.summary: Reset W2 estimate for a client (allows recalculation)

404.description: Client not found or no W2 estimate

get.summary: Get W2 estimate data for a client (for visual review)
Get pre-filled client data for consent form

400.description: Invalid request or missing required data

post.summary: Sign consent form with client signature

200.description: Returns signed URL for PDF download

get.summary: Get download URL for signed consent form
IRS monitor stats (status changes in last 24h)
Get all clients with taxes_filed status

post.summary: Run IRS check for all taxes_filed clients (fire & forget)
Run IRS WMR check for a specific client

get.summary: Get IRS check history for a specific client
Export all IRS checks as CSV
Get a 24-hour signed URL for a check screenshot

info.title: Portal JAI1 API
info.description: API para gestin de tax refunds - Estudiantes J-1

password.description: User password (min 8 chars, must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special char)

refresh_token.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access tokens

expires_in.description: Access token expiry time in seconds

refresh_token.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access tokens

email.description: Email address to send password reset link

userId.description: User ID who received the notification

is_draft.description: Whether this is a draft save (allows partial data)

ssn.description: Social Security Number (9 digits, with or without dashes)

type.description: Type of refund to confirm (federal or state)
Type of commission to mark as paid

reviewNote.description: Optional admin review note about the payment verification

sendEmail.description: Whether to also send email notification

subject.example: Question about my tax refund status

message.example: I would like to know when I can expect my refund.

federalInProcessDays.description: Days before federal in-process status triggers alarm (1-365)

stateInProcessDays.description: Days before state in-process status triggers alarm (1-365)

verificationTimeoutDays.description: Days before verification timeout triggers alarm (1-365)

letterSentTimeoutDays.description: Days before letter sent timeout triggers alarm (1-365)

reason.description: Reason for threshold change (for audit log)

signedAt.description: When the consent form was signed

canDownload.description: Whether the signed PDF can be downloaded

canSign.description: Whether the profile is complete enough for signing

missingFields.description: Missing fields that need to be completed

signature.description: Client signature as base64 encoded PNG image
